name: DeeperEn'Deeper
description:
Set in the year 420XX DeeperEn'Deeper, a meteor shooting somewhat fast-paced game, where you are a brave astronaut who volunteered to venture deep for the space station ERYCIN-2's research of The Infinity And Beyond.
Press W-A-S-D to move your spaceship, move your mouse to aim and shoot with Left Mouse, press R to self-destruct your spaceship
